item.title: Business Development Specialist
item.description: We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Business Development Specialist to manage our lead pipeline, ensure data quality, and support business development initiatives. This role is critical in bridging the gap between automated lead generation systems and human decision-making, while also contributing to the overall growth of HuSig’s client base. As our Business Development Specialist, you will be responsible for monitoring, validating, and enriching leads generated through our CRM platform, ensuring that our sales and business development efforts are targeting high-quality prospects.
